scripts.invoke: aws lambda invoke --function-name calc-function --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out --payload file://request.json response.json
scripts.deploy: npm run make-zip && npm run config && npm run update-zip && npm run invoke
scripts.create: npm run make-zip && aws lambda create-function --function-name calc-function --runtime nodejs14.x --zip-file fileb://function.zip --handler index.handler --role arn:aws:iam::344513066772:role/lambda-ex
